items.sentence: Perhaps you would be happier in another job.
Philosophy is an interesting field of study.
Please be careful when you cross the street.
Please call me at your earliest convenience.
Why do you think I don\'t like your friends?
Does Tom know that you\'re going to do that?
At first, Tom refused to believe the rumors.
Can I borrow three hundred dollars from you?
Tom didn\'t actually do what he said he did.
Tom didn\'t arrive until the party was over.
Tom didn\'t buy a new car yesterday, did he?
Tom\'s brother is married to Mary\'s sister.
We didn\'t do as well as we would\'ve liked.
We\'ll have to shovel the snow off the roof.
We\'re going to have to tell Tom everything.
Tom didn\'t intend to hurt Mary\'s feelings.
Your friend Tom told me to give this to you.
Tom got tired of working with Mary and quit.
Tom grabbed a towel and headed for the pool.
Tom thought both of Mary\'s ideas were good.
